bibl.title: Cleopatra. A Sourcebook. (Oklahoma Series in Classical Culture. 31.)
bibl.note: Preface. - Introduction. - Part One: Ancient Sources. - Part Two: Reception. - Maps. - Genealogical Tables. - Chronological Table: The Death of Alexander the Great to the Death of Cleopatra. - Glossary. Selective Cleopatra Filmography. Bibliography. Index.
bibl.seg: JONES Prudence J., Cleopatra. A Sourcebook. (Oklahoma Series in Classical Culture. 31.)
Norman, OK, University of Oklahoma Press, 2006, 8°, xv-345 pp., 2 arbres généal., 7 figg., 2 cartes. ISBN 0-8061-3741-X. $19.95.
